plot: The sixth entry in the Screen Smapshots series filmed in Technicolor. Shown having a good time at Hollywood's Mocambo Club are film stars Tab Hunter and Rock Hudson. Also seen are Bob Hope,...
title: Screen Snapshots 1856: The Mocambo Party
